verses.name: Luke 20:13
verses.text: Then said the lord of the vineyard, What shall I do? I will send my beloved son: it may be they will reverence him when they see him.

verses.name: Luke 20:14
verses.text: But when the husbandmen saw him, they reasoned among themselves, saying, This is the heir: come, let us kill him, that the inheritance may be ours.

verses.name: Luke 20:15
verses.text: So they cast him out of the vineyard, and killed him. What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them?

verses.name: Luke 20:16
verses.text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen, and shall give the vineyard to others. And when they heard it, they said, God forbid.
